aboutMe.technologiesAndTools: Technologies and tools I have used

1.title: Botica Junin
1.description: E-commerce mobile application for pharmacy. It has: registration and user login, stores' location, promotions, shopping cart, physical or home delivery of products, store contact and medication reminder.

2.title: Wayu Inc
2.description: Corporate website to offer different development services in technology, digital marketing and design. It also has a contact form, about us, and the different technologies that have been worked with.

3.title: Slon Care
3.description: Web system for health savings with a payment gateway, where different users can obtain services from doctors and / or clinics such as medical appointments, surgical operations, emergency tickets, among others.

4.title: Bison Reserve Landing Page
4.description: Informative website on reservation services for sports centers and gyms, plans and prices, and information on upcoming versions of Bison Reserve in other areas.

5.title: Bison Reserve App
5.description: Mobile application of the Bison Reserve system, where users belonging to a sports center or gym can observe: disciplines, class calendar with their schedule and coach, reservation of classes they wish to attend, score of classes in which a user participated, payment through the platform, record of the last payments made, relevant news and information from the sports center / gym.

6.title: Marbyl App
6.description: Mobile application for discovering, listening to, interacting with, and sharing on social media podcasts or 'marbyl/moments'

7.title: Pavimenti Store App
7.description: E-commerce mobile application for the sale of construction materials. It has: user registration and login, store location, promotions, payment registration, physical or home delivery of products, and store contact.

8.title: Alternos
8.description: Corporate website with a landing web structure dedicated to communication production and dissemination. Sections of: about us, services, news, among others.
